page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT 1
page.content: The main jobs are in the tourist industry,either owning ,or working in cafes and hotels, or doing bed and breakfast, or owning gift shops, although in this area there aren't many of these.Campsites have grown up over the last few years and now people have started to have tourists on farms {BEDRUTHAN STEPS HOTEL:}is run by Mr& Mrs.Whittington and is set in 5 acres of ground over-looking Mawgan Porth Bay.It has 75 bedroom suites all with private bathrooms.There are also villa suites,and home-made and local food is a feature of the hotel restaurant and The Four Seasons Restaurant which is also open to the general public.They provide special menus for children. Facilities provided are squash,tennis, pool,snooker,dancing,films,cards,bars, solarium,saunas,hydro spars,bar-b-que, landrette and a baby listening service
